lesson.title: Final Steps
lesson.summary: Finish up and get ready to graduate!

atoms.title: Graduation
atoms.text:
## Graduation

Once all your projects have Met or Exceeded Specifications, you'll see a special screen with a button to get started with the graduation process.  The button will send you an email with instructions to verify your ID, complete a Final Reflection, and possibly schedule an exit interview.  After we've verified your completion of the required steps, we will graduate you from the Nanodegree.  Congratulations!

***If you are having any troubles going through this process or if you have any questions, please email us at graduation-support@udacity.com.***

## Identification Verification
Your email will contain a special link to verify your identity. You also may be asked to participate in a scheduled exit interview.

For the identification process you will need a valid ID (i.e. Drivers license, government issued ID, or Passport) and access to a webcam or digital scanner. For a full list of supported countries and ID's please be sure check [here](https://www.jumio.com/netverify/supported-countries/). If you do not see your country or ID type on this list please contact graduation-support@udacity.com.

## Exit Interviews
If you are selected for an interview, we will be asking you technical questions to verify your understanding of the material as a whole. It would be helpful to review the knowledge learned from your projects, but additional preparation is not necessary. Expect the interview to take about half an hour.

## Final Reflection
The email will also contain a link to a Final Reflection. This is an opportunity to reflect back on all the things you have learned and prepare you for the next stage in getting a job or the promotion that you've earned.
